bill.title: Implementation Updates To Behavioral Health Administration
bill.description: Concerning implementation updates to the behavioral health administration, and, in connection therewith making and reducing an appropriation.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Public & Behavioral Health & Human Services
House Committee on Public & Behavioral Health & Human Services Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Health & Human Services
Senate Committee on Health & Human Services Refer Amended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
Senate Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Senate Third Reading Reconsidered - No Amendments
Senate Third Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate
